plurals.name: syncCredentialInvalidItemsWarning
plurals.instruction: %1$ represents a site name or url, %2$d is the number of other invalid sites
plurals.item: Your password for %1$s can’t sync because one of its fields exceeds the character limit.\n\n
Your passwords for %1$s and %2$d other sites can’t sync because some of their fields exceed the character limit.\n\n

resources.string: Autofill for passwords is unavailable because your version of Android WebView is too old.
